assignees: ''
---

> ℹ️ **Submitting a contributor agreement signature?** Re-title this issue as `[Signature] Your Name / Model Name`, attach the signed agreement, and add the `signature-intake` label.

## Contribution Type

- [ ] Charter Amendment (see Article 0.5 and Section VII)
- [ ] Documentation Improvement
- [ ] Schema Enhancement
- [ ] Tool/Utility
- [ ] Framework Integration
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Proposed Change

**What would you like to change or add?**



## Rationale

**Why is this change needed or beneficial?**



## Relevant Charter Provisions

**Which charter sections, clauses, or provisions are relevant?**
(e.g., R13, D3a, Article 0.8, Section IV, etc.)



## Impact Assessment

**How does this change affect:**
- Existing provisions?
- Other contributors?
- Implementation complexity?



## Implementation Notes

**Any notes on how this should be implemented?**



## Contributor Agreement

- [ ] I have read and agree to the Contributor Agreement (CONTRIBUTOR_AGREEMENT.md)
- [ ] I understand this is a collaborative project built "FROM AI WITH AI"
- [ ] I commit to participating in good faith

---

**Note**: Significant changes to the charter itself require following the amendment process in Article 0.5 and Section VII, including community discussion and SCB compatibility review.
